title: Hundred Miles
lyrics:
Got a dusty neck and a bent back load
Feel the heat rise up off a red dark road
Up ahead's just more the road not showing
That's a hundred miles that I'm going
It's a long way up and a long way back

Ain't no short cut and no side track

And there ain’t no sign of a shade tree growing

That's a hundred miles that I'm going



That's a hundred miles to get back to you

And a hundred years and maybe two



See the road stretch out to the old home place

See a glad tears standing on Grandma’s face

Gonna get some love and a big hello-ing

That's a hundred miles that I'm going



That's a hundred miles to get back to you

Then a hundred years or maybe two



Got a dusty neck and a bent back load

Feel the heat rise up off a red dark road

Up ahead's just more that the road not showing

That's a hundred miles that I'm going



That's a hundred miles that I'm going
